name: Sunlighter
description:
Sunlighter was created for the Brackeys Jam 2018 Edition.
**Updating game page today !**

  • Story

You wake up in a bed that is not yours, rushing outside to try to figure out where you are.
You meet Steve, a ghost, he is telling you that you are the new Sunlighter !
What is a Sunlighter ? Just the man that light up the Sun every morning....

  • Controls
    • Left/Right : A/D
    • Jump : Space
    • Action/Dialogue : Q
    • Switch Light : E
    • Fill/Refill Fuel : F (Keep)
    • Grab Object : X
    • Light up Lantern : Shift
    • Respawn (if stuck) : R
  • Credits

Design & Dev & "Art" : Shyzuna.
